paragraphs.context: Dolphin 是 KDE 的文件管理器，您可以使用它来浏览硬盘、U 盘、SD 卡和其他存储设备中的内容，也可以方便快捷地创建、移动、删除文件和文件夹。安装命令为：sudo apt-get install dolphin。卸载命令为：sudo apt-get remove dolphin。仓库地址是：http://packages.deepin.com/deepin/pool/main/d/dolphin/。官方网站：https://apps.kde.org/dolphin/

qas.question: Dolphin 是什么类型的软件？
Dolphin 能操作哪些存储设备？

answers.text: 硬盘、U 盘、SD 卡和其他存储设备

qas.question: 使用 Dolphin 可以执行哪些文件操作？

answers.text: 创建、移动、删除文件和文件夹

qas.question: 如何在系统上安装 Dolphin？
卸载 Dolphin 的命令是什么？
Dolphin 的软件仓库地址是什么？
Dolphin 的官方网站地址是什么？

paragraphs.context: dolphin contains plenty of productivity features that will save you time . the multiple tabs and split view features allow navigating multiple folders at the same time , and you can easily drag and drop files between views to move or copy them . dolphin 's right - click menu provides with many quick actions that let you compress , share , and duplicate files , among many other things . you can also add your own custom actions .

qas.question: Dolphin有哪些提高效率的功能？

answers.text: 多标签和分屏视图（允许同时浏览多个文件夹，可在视图间拖放文件移动或复制）、右键菜单提供压缩、共享、复制文件等快速操作，还可添加自定义操作

qas.question: 多标签和分屏视图功能有什么作用？

answers.text: 允许同时浏览多个文件夹，可在视图间拖放文件移动或复制

qas.question: 右键菜单可以进行哪些快速操作？

answers.text: 压缩、共享、复制文件等，还可添加自定义操作

paragraphs.context: dolphin is very lightweight , but at the same time , you can adapt it to your specific needs . this means that you can carry out your file management exactly the way you want to . dolphin supports three different view modes : a classic grid view of all the files , a more detailed view , and a tree view . you can also configure most of dolphin 's behavior .

answers.text: 轻量，同时可以适应特定需求，支持三种不同的视图模式，大部分行为可配置
经典网格视图、更详细的视图和树视图

paragraphs.context: dolphin can display files and folders from many internet cloud services and other remote machines as if they were right there on your desktop . dolphin also comes with an integrated terminal that allows you to run commands on the current folder .

qas.question: Dolphin可以显示来自哪些地方的文件和文件夹？

answers.text: 许多互联网云服务和其他远程机器
集成终端，允许在当前文件夹运行命令

paragraphs.context: you can extend the capabilities of dolphin even further with powerful plugins to adapt it to your workflow . you can use the git integration plugin to interact with git repositories , or the nextcloud plugin to synchronize your files online , and much more . dolphin integration for revision control systems , dropbox , and disk images transparent integration of audio cds with kde plasma and kde applications with data conversion capabilities

answers.text: 通过强大的插件，如git集成插件（与git仓库交互）、nextcloud插件（在线同步文件）等

qas.question: git集成插件的作用是什么？

answers.text: 版本控制系统、Dropbox、磁盘镜像、音频CD与KDE Plasma和KDE应用程序（具有数据转换功能）
